name: BattleTennis
description:
BattleTennis is a tennis based game, where the user tries to beat the AI Tennis Bot... first release, still in development.

How to play:

  1. The player always goes first.
  2. The goal of the game is to take the life out of the bot, but making him miss and hit the wall behind him.
  3. Use E and F to do different style hits to the ball, arrows while holding the button will move the target point. 
  4. Use R or T to serve the ball.
